<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
             <chapter date="${sys.datetime("dd.MM.yyyy")}"> 
        
        
        
            
            
                
                    
                        
                    
                
                
            
            
            
            
                
                    
                        
                            
                        
                    
                    
                        declare variable $doc as node() external;
                        
                       
                        let $title := data($doc//h2)
                        let $subtitle := data($doc//h4)
                        let $number := data($doc//p/i/a)
                        let $text := data($doc//p)
                            return
                                <chapter>
                                    <title>{data($title)}</title>
                                    <subtitle>{data($subtitle)}</subtitle>
                                    <number>{data($number)}</number>
                                    <text>{data($text)}</text>
                                </chapter>
                    
                
            
        
        
        
        
         </chapter>
